description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A competitive game where each player tries to take over the pond, filling it with their own fish, while knocking other players out of the game.  Overpopulate cells with fish so that they jump into neighboring cells, taking over opponent fish.  Using special items- lure, freeze, or flush your opponents' fish.  An extended form of the chain-reaction type game.
